-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Limit number of IO actions started per second
--   
--   Limit the number of tasks started per second. The throttle function
--   will run all actions concurrently but only starting a certain number
--   per second. It will wait for all tasks and return the results in a
--   list.
@package io-throttle
@version 0.1.0


module Control.Concurrent.Throttle

-- | Limit the number of <tt>tasks</tt> started per second.
--   <tt>throttle</tt> will run all actions concurrently but only starting
--   a certain number per second. It will wait for all tasks and return the
--   results in a list.
throttle :: Int -> [IO a] -> IO [a]
